The correct way to finish playing content is to either wait for the end of content or to call stop and wait for the stop operation to complete, then call close.
member.param: Use forceSync to run on current thread.

member.summary: Starts to download the desired media.

To use this method in Android External Storage Write permission must be set to true.
Check the permision using Permission.HasUserAuthorizedPermission(Permission.ExternalStorageWrite) before calling this method.

member.name: T:NexPlayerAPI.NexErrorCode
member.summary: Possible values of param1 when an error event is generated

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexErrorCode.NONE
member.summary: No error.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexErrorCode.HAS_NO_EFFECT
member.summary: The same command has been called already in the same state or the command is invalid. E.g. If an open API is called while processing an open API, the engine does not regard it as an error.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexErrorCode.INVALID_PARAMETER
member.summary: This error will be called if the UI has wrong parameters such as \c NULL.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexErrorCode.NXErrorInvalidInfo
member.summary: One or more of the information passed in is invalid. iOS ONLY.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexErrorCode.INVALID_STATE
member.summary: The command is invalid at the current state. E.g. pause() is called when the current state is NEXPLAYER_STATE_STOP.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexErrorCode.NXErrorMemoryOperation
member.summary: The memory operation failed. E.g. Heap memory allocation. iOS only error.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexErrorCode.NXErrorFileOperation
member.summary: The file operation failed. E.g. File seek, file open. iOS ONLY.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexErrorCode.INVALID_MEDIA
member.summary: The content file contains invalid syntax. It should be checked whether or not the content is a normal DRM file.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexErrorCode.NOT_SUPPORT_AUDIO_CODEC
member.summary: NexPlayer does not support the audio codec of the content. E.g. The content is not yet supported by NexPlayer or a customer could not include codecs of NexPlayer SDK due to licensing issues.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexErrorCode.NOT_SUPPORT_VIDEO_CODEC
member.summary: NexPlayer does not support the video codec of the content. E.g. The content is not yet supported by NexPlayer or the customer did not include codecs of NexPlayer SDK due to licensing issues.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexErrorCode.NOT_SUPPORT_VIDEO_RESOLUTION
member.summary: The resolution of the content is too high to play back. E.g. The device has a resolution limit of 1080P but the content is 4K.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexErrorCode.NOT_SUPPORT_MEDIA
member.summary: The format of the content is not supported. The content has unavailable protocol(HLS,DASH, etc) or no playable A/V track which has audio or video codecs that are not supported.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexErrorCode.NXErrorInvalidCodec
member.summary: The content includes unknown audio or video codec type. iOS ONLY.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexErrorCode.CODEC_DECODING_ERROR
member.summary: Audio or video decoding error. E.g. NexPlayer get a failure during parsing the content for playback or during decoding the audio or video bitstreams.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexErrorCode.NXErrorPartialSuccess
member.summary: iOS ONLY.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexErrorCode.NXErrorAlreadyCreateAsyncProc
member.summary: iOS ONLY.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexErrorCode.NXErrorInvalidAsyncCmd
member.summary: iOS ONLY.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexErrorCode.NXErrorAsyncOthercmdPrcessing
member.summary: The command queue for processing invoked Async functions was full. iOS ONLY.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexErrorCode.NXErrorRTCPByeReceived
member.summary: An error occurred in receiving RTCP BYE message from streaming server. iOS ONLY.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexErrorCode.NXErrorUserTerminated
member.summary: Terminated by the user. iOS ONLY.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexErrorCode.NXErrorSystemFail
member.summary: iOS ONLY.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexErrorCode.NXErrorNoDataInBuffer
member.summary: iOS ONLY.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexErrorCode.UNKNOWN
member.summary: This error is a kind of internal error such as "system failure". E.g. NexPlayer returns this when memory allocation is failed for unknown reasons. It's mostly an error that the user can not handle.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexErrorCode.NOT_SUPPORT_TO_SEEK
member.summary: The media source does not support seeking. The only Iframe content(Content is composed of I, B, and P frames), chunked mode based PD content, or live content with an wide interval between each Iframe cannot be seeked.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexErrorCode.NXErrorNotSupportAVCodec
member.summary: iOS ONLY.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexErrorCode.NOT_SUPPORT_TEXT
member.summary: The content has an unsupported text type. ANDROID ONLY.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexErrorCode.SOURCE_OPEN_TIMEOUT
member.summary: There is no response from the server within the set time of SOURCE_OPEN_TIMEOUT property while calling open(). The default value of the SOURCE_OPEN_TIMEOUT property is 300 seconds.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexErrorCode.DATA_INACTIVITY_TIMEOUT
member.summary: There is no response from the server within the set time of DATA_INACTIVITY_TIMEOUT property. The default value of the DATA_INACTIVITY_TIMEOUT property is 60 seconds.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexErrorCode.ERROR_NETWORK_PROTOCOL
member.summary: Network related error such as socket errors. E.g. Socket open fail, connect fail, bind fail,...

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexErrorCode.ERROR_MEDIA_NOT_FOUND
member.summary: The content media was not found on the server. E.g. 403 forbidden, 404 not found,....

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexErrorCode.DRM_DECRYPT_FAILED
member.summary: The default error of content DRM Decrypt Fail.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexErrorCode.DRM_INIT_FAILED

member.name: T:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerEvent
member.summary: Possible events that NexPlayer sends to every Action subscribed to with

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerEvent.NEXPLAYER_EVENT_INIT_COMPLETE
member.summary: This event occurs whenever the player has opened a video content.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerEvent.NEXPLAYER_EVENT_PLAYBACK_STARTED
member.summary: This event occurs whenever the player has started the playback or has resumed.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerEvent.NEXPLAYER_EVENT_END_OF_CONTENT
member.summary: This event occurs when the player reaches the end of the video content.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerEvent.NEXPLAYER_EVENT_ON_TIME
member.summary: This event occurs once per second.
member.remarks: If the application is displaying the current play position, it should update it to reflect this new value.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerEvent.NEXPLAYER_EVENT_BUFFERING_STARTED
member.summary: This event occurs whenever the player has started buffering.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerEvent.NEXPLAYER_EVENT_BUFFERING_ENDED
member.summary: This event occurs whenever the player has finished buffering.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerEvent.NEXPLAYER_EVENT_TEXTURE_CHANGED
member.summary: This event occurs whenever the reference to the internal texture has changed.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerEvent.NEXPLAYER_EVENT_TRACK_CHANGED
member.summary: This event occurs whenever the track of the playback has changed.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerEvent.NEXPLAYER_EVENT_PLAYBACK_PAUSED
member.summary: This event occurs whenever the playback has paused.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerEvent.NEXPLAYER_EVENT_CLOSED
member.summary: This event occurs whenever the player has closed
member.remarks: This means it ended all the work on the content currently open and closed content data.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerEvent.NEXPLAYER_EVENT_ERROR
member.summary: This event occurs whenever an error occurs during playback.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerEvent.NEXPLAYER_EVENT_STOPPED
member.summary: This event occurs whenever the playback has stopped.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerEvent.NEXPLAYER_EVENT_SEEKED
member.summary: This event occurs whenever the playback has seeked.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerEvent.NEXPLAYER_EVENT_BUFFERING
member.summary: This event occurs while the player is buffering.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerEvent.NEXPLAYER_EVENT_ON_TOTAL_TIME_CHANGED
member.summary: This event occurs whenever the total time is changed during the playback.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerEvent.NEXPLAYER_EVENT_ON_HANDLE_EXTERNAL_PCM
member.summary: This event occurs whenever there is new audio PCM data.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerEvent.NEXPLAYER_EVENT_AUDIO_TRACK_CHANGED
member.summary: This event occurs whenever the audio track of the playback has changed.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerEvent.NEXPLAYER_EVENT_LOADING
member.summary: This event occurs whenever the player is loading.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerEvent.NEXPLAYER_EVENT_TEXT_BASE
member.summary: This is is base of TEXT RENDER Event

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerEvent.NEXPLAYER_EVENT_TEXT_INIT
member.summary: This event occurs when the subtitle parsing is complete.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerEvent.NEXPLAYER_EVENT_TEXT_RENDER
member.summary: This event occurs whenever playback reaches a point in time where subtitles on any track need to be displayed or cleared.

member.summary: This event occurs whenever a close caption (subtitle) needs to be erased
member.remarks: Deprecated: Use instead

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerEvent.NEXPLAYER_EVENT_TIMED_METADATA_BASE

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerEvent.NEXPLAYER_EVENT_TIMED_METADATA_RENDER
member.summary: This event is called when new timed metadata is ready for display in HLS.
member.remarks: Timed metadata includes additional information about the playing content that may be displayed to the user and this information may change at different times throughout the content. Each time new metadata is available for display, this event occurs.

member.name: T:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerError
member.summary: Obsolete: use instead

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerError.NEXPLAYER_ERROR_NONE
member.summary: Obsolete: use instead

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerError.NEXPLAYER_ERROR_GENERAL
member.summary: Obsolete: use instead The same command has been called already in the same state or the command is invalid. E.g. If an open API is called while processing an open API, the engine does not regard it as an error.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerError.NEXPLAYER_ERROR_INVALID_SDK
member.summary: Obsolete: use instead Error while creating or initializing NexPlayer.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerError.NEXPLAYER_ERROR_INIT
member.summary: Obsolete: use instead Error while creating or initializing NexPlayer. ANDROID ONLY.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerError.NEXPLAYER_ERROR_NOT_ACTIVATED_APP_ID
member.summary: Obsolete: use instead Error while creating or initializing NexPlayer.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerError.NEXPLAYER_ERROR_TIME_LOCKED
member.summary: Obsolete: use instead The SDK has expired.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerError.NEXPLAYER_ERROR_NO_LICENSE_FILE
member.summary: Obsolete: use instead Error while creating or initializing NexPlayer.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerError.NEXPLAYER_ERROR_DRM_INIT
member.summary: Obsolete: use instead The content DRM Initialization Failed.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerError.NEXPLAYER_UNKNOWN_ERROR_CHECK_LINKS
member.summary: Obsolete: use instead This error is a kind of internal error such as "system failure". E.g. NexPlayer returns this when memory allocation is failed for unknown reasons. It's mostly an error that the user can not handle.

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerError.NEXPLAYER_ERROR_NETWORK
member.summary: Obsolete: use instead Network related error such as socket errors. E.g. Socket open fail, connect fail, bind fail,...

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerError.NEXPLAYER_INVALID_SUBTITLE
member.summary: Obsolete: use instead Input wrong subtitle

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerError.NEXPLAYER_ERROR_SRC_NOT_FOUND
member.summary: Obsolete: use instead The URI is not supported or not found. Make sure the URI actually exists and check that necessary permissions are set. E.g. Playing a video on Android requires setting the Player Setting "Internet Access" to "Required" (streaming videos) and the "Write Permission" to "External" (local videos).

member.name: F:NexPlayerAPI.NexPlayerError.NEXPLAYER_ERROR_URL
member.summary: Obsolete: use instead The URL was not found.
